item.title: Colruyt meets Foursquare
item.author: d.dierickx@gmail.com (Dominique Dierickx)
item.description: Experiment on extracting visit statistics to points-of-interests using the Foursquare API and some Python scripts. Find out the best time & day to visit your local supermarket or other POIs by analyzing crowdsourced data. Results of a three-week data monitoring experiment is presented here as well as the created tools used to gather it.

item.title: The making of dominiek.eu
item.author: d.dierickx@gmail.com (Dominique Dierickx)
item.description: Some words on how this website was created using third party tools such as Jekyll and Foundation.
